description:
Light Magic and the Hero is a game that follows Alicia Ehnleit and her companions. But we`re not following that story. The game`s hidden boss no longer has any interest in antagonizing them. She simply wants to grind levels and live peacefully.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Hidden Boss Enters the Academy
Ura Boss, Gakuen ni Nyuugaku Suru
裏ボス, 学園に入学する
